channel.title: [PI] Clan Chat Capitalization
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/219nqsg.jpg[/img]
Well, I've tried so many different methods of trying to fix this, including help from fellow members of the community, but I just can't seem to get it. I've tried modifying the client's 'clan chat' packet 217. I've tried editing all of my clan chat files to try and get some results, but nothing is working. Could someone PLEASE offer me any sort of assistance?

item.title: [PI] Clan Chat Capitalization
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Post your methods? Also if all else fails you can just add .toLowerCase() at the end of your string.

Read full topic
